author: anon-96756

ctx: Romanca s televizijami na žetone v bolnišnicah
content:
Ah, te romantične novinarke ...
"Najdražji TV aparat" za 250.000 USD ni TV aparat, ampak
profesionalni kinematografski projektor Runco, 155 kilogramska
pošast (www.runco.com/sc-1.html)

Res ima Runco tudi malo dražje TV aparate (plazma), ampak
najdražji, 61-palčni, stane manj kot 20.000 USD (www.runco.com/pl-61dhd.html)
author: anon-542

ctx: Romanca s televizijami na žetone v bolnišnicah
content:
Technically considered a television, Union City, Calif.-based
Runco's $249,995 MBX-1 is really more like a mini-theater. For a
quarter of a million dollars, the lucky buyer gets a three-chip
digital projection system that has enough power to project to
screens that are as large as 41 feet wide. There are comparable
products available from other companies, but Runco's MBX-1 is the
highest in terms of list prices. The trick is finding 41 feet of
wall space.

For more information, please visit www.runco.com
author: anon-11769

ctx: Romanca s televizijami na žetone v bolnišnicah
content:
Pa kaj je s temi bolniki, oni bi bolniške mize pa še televizijo bi
gledal. Pa sej so znorel.
author: anon-1691

ctx: Romanca s televizijami na žetone v bolnišnicah
content: wtf, a boste zdaj še slike dovoljevali?!
author: anon-9939

ctx: Romanca s televizijami na žetone v bolnišnicah
content:
A misliš tiste slike na stenah? Ne, tudi tiste naj bodo na žetone.
100 sit na uro, potem pa pride sestra in sliko vzame in jo nese v
drugo sobo in spet pokasira 100 sit. 10% je od sestre, ostalo pa
gre v sklad za magnetno resonanco.
author: anon-1691
